channel.title: [562] NPC Removing?
channel.description:
Hey, Okay so I'm using the RuneKill source, (runeslay) And theres some annoying NPC's at the home area I would like to get rid of, Captn Izzy or something, and the theiving guy, how do I remove them? I went to the npc folder, and removed the line that had there name, and it didn't remove them :(
What should I do now?
